rukus.text: 17|71|jis din ham, sab logon ko unake agranee ke saath bulaayenge, to jinaka karmalekh unake seedhe haath mein diya jaayega, to vahee apana karmalekh padhenge aur unapar dhaage baraabar bhee atyaachaar nahin kiya jaayega.
17|72|aur jo is (sansaar) mein andha[1] rah gaya, to vah aakhirat (paralok) mein bhee andha aur adhik kupath hoga.

17|73|aur (he nabee!) vah (kaafir) sameep tha ki aapako us vahî€¼yee se pher den, jo hamane aapakee or bhejee hai, taaki aap hamaare oopar apanee or se koee doosaree baat ghad len aur us samay ve aapako avashy apana mitr bana lete.
17|74|aur yadi ham aapako sudrdh na rakhate, to aap unakee or kuchh na kuchh jhuk jaate.
17|75|tab ham aapako jeevan kee dugunee tatha maran kee doharee yaatana chakhaate. phir aap apane lie hamaare oopar koee sahaayak na paate.
17|76|aur sameep hai ki ve aapako is dharatee (makka) se vichala den, taaki aapako usase nikaal den, tab va aapake pashchaat kuchh hee din rah sakenge.
17|77|ye[1] usake lie niyam raha hai, jise hamane aapase pahale apane rasoolon mein se bheja hai aur aap hamaare niyam mein koee parivartan nahin paayenge.
